name: Unrelenting Evil
description:
Long ago, the world was devastated by the appearance of a mysterious being, Aratuk. After a tough conflict, a hero was able to drive Aratuk away, but the world knew its power still lingered. The last remaining forces of humanity located the hiding spot of Aratuk, a temple rumoured to house an artefact, the Idol of Eternity, which would surely be able to restore its full power, or be used to decimate the unrelenting evil once and for all...

You are Kadren, a specialist machine designed to retrieve old relics. Your mission? To save the world!
